attributes.comment:
As an adoptive parent of middle-class America, I'm outraged at the planned fee
hike. The services overall have been abysmal, with federal workers doing work
that in general population they'd have been fired for.

These fees are unacceptable, and with adoptions taking longer, and with no
option of renewing 171h/797c approvals, the expense is astronomical. I hope you
will take the counsel of adoptive families, and decline to raise these fees yet
again. The fees keep going up, and the level of service we are paying for does
not follow in accord. There's absolutely no accountability in the Orphans
Petitions offices across the country.

Thank you,
Valerie Martin,
Adoptive Parent
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Valerie Martin
